channel.title: Lady From Day
channel.itunes:author: April Sadowski
channel.itunes:summary: Lady from Day is a story about an adventurer Lia (Sophie Neveu) and her group of companions and their quest to save the princess Daschl Feyris (Cerhiunnhn) from her malady. The princess is cursed with an appetite that doesn't cease unless she is asleep. She is always hungry and has been eating all of the kingdom's food. Lia, her counterpart Siegfried (JauntyHat) roam Feyris and the outlying regions in search of a cure for the princess. Through their journey they meet up with some unexpected people and encounter some horrible creatures such as the gorlags (Emcgo, Moose, Klaymen) and beautiful places like Harper Wood. Come listen to the story over a course of four Books. View full cast and audio credits from production link.
channel.description: Lady from Day is a story about an adventurer Lia (Sophie Neveu) and her group of companions and their quest to save the princess Daschl Feyris (Cerhiunnhn) from her malady. The princess is cursed with an appetite that doesn't cease unless she is asleep. She is always hungry and has been eating all of the kingdom's food. Lia, her counterpart Siegfried (JauntyHat) roam Feyris and the outlying regions in search of a cure for the princess. Through their journey they meet up with some unexpected people and encounter some horrible creatures such as the gorlags (Emcgo, Moose, Klaymen) and beautiful places like Harper Wood. Come listen to the story over a course of four Books. View full cast and audio credits from production link.

item.title: Book I - Chapter I - The Beginning
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu) accounts her tale and The Beginning starts with a description of the world they live in and how they came to be where they are now. Supporting cast includes Group of Men (Blackened88, Emcgo, JauntyHat, Whiskey Hicks, and Taro). For full cast and musical credits, visit the website, www.ladyfromday.com.
item.itunes:summary: Lia (Sophie Neveu) accounts her tale and The Beginning starts with a description of the world they live in and how they came to be where they are now. item.title: Book I - Chapter II - First Meetings
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu) talks to Siegfried (JauntyHat) about her predicament, then goes to find the princess Daschl(Cerhiunnhn). Other supporting cast includes Castle Servant (R. Douglas Barbieri). For full cast and musical credits, visit the website, www.ladyfromday.com.

item.title: Book I - Chapter III - Appetizers
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu) goes to the feating hall to meet up with Siegfried (JauntyHat) and King Birchell (Klaymen) and his daughter (Cerhiunnhn). The entire cast is the group voice for "hear, hear". For full cast and musical credits, visit the website, www.ladyfromday.com.

item.title: Book I - Chapter IV - A Kingly Encounter
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu) talks to King Birchell (Klaymen) about the mission in the grand hall. For full cast and musical credits, visit the website, www.ladyfromday.com.

item.title: Book I - Chapter V - Questions
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu)talks to Siegfried (JauntyHat) about how the meeting went with the king. Siegfried decides to go meet Daschl and then talks to Lia about their meeting and more about Daschl's past. After that, Lia decides it's time to leave and start the quest. For full cast and musical credits, visit the website, www.ladyfromday.com.

item.title: Book I - Chapter VI - A Questing We Will Go
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu) travels into the Swamp of Sandring. Aras (Barbieri) and Renold (Blackened88) play an important role in this chapter.

item.title: Book I - Chapter VII - The Gorlags
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu) and her group encounter gorlags (Emcgo, Moose) and listen quietly as they talk about some woman that escaped.
item.itunes:summary: Lia (Sophie Neveu) and her group encounter gorlags (Emcgo, Moose) and listen quietly as they talk about some woman that escaped.
item.itunes:keywords: enemy, suspense, conversation, overhear, journey, adventure, quest, mission, fantasy, novel, audio book

item.title: Book I - Chapter VIII - A Surprise Visit
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu) and her group are surprised by a visit from Prince Rowan (PhaeThorn) of Feyris who has orders from his sister Daschl to ensure the safety of Lia on her quest. He revealed himself to her because of the encounter of the Gorlags in the previous chapter and they were getting so close to Gorlag territory it would be best for her to be informed of an ally in case of a battle with them. Gorlags show up and then Lia, Rowan, and Siegfried (JauntyHat) decide what to do.
item.itunes:summary: Lia (Sophie Neveu) and her group are surprised by a visit from Prince Rowan (PhaeThorn) of Feyris who has orders from his sister Daschl to ensure the safety of Lia on her quest. He revealed himself to her because of the encounter of the Gorlags in the pre
item.itunes:keywords: quest, adventure, prince, royalty, woods, forest, walking, town, medieval, fantasy, fiction, book, audio, radioplay

item.title: Book I - Chapter IX - The Next Step
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu) and Rowan (PhaeThorn) have dinner together and realize there is some wrong with the Inn they are staying in. They go upstairs to discuss further. Siegfried (JauntyHat) gets annoyed (as usual) with his lack of attention.
item.itunes:summary: Lia (Sophie Neveu) and Rowan (PhaeThorn) have dinner together and realize there is some wrong with the Inn they are staying in. They go upstairs to discuss further. Siegfried (JauntyHat) gets annoyed (as usual) with his lack of attention.

item.title: Book I - Chapter X - Boys Will Be Boys
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Rowan escorts Lia to breakfast where they try to pry information from the Innkeeper. The Innkeeper asks them to meet later at the town church. They find out more information and stumble upon a monk who helps lead them out of the church through secret passageways.
item.itunes:summary: Rowan escorts Lia to breakfast where they try to pry information from the Innkeeper. The Innkeeper asks them to meet later at the town church. They find out more information and stumble upon a monk who helps lead them out of the church through secret passageways.

item.title: Book I - Chapter XI - Harper Wood
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: RLia and Rowan head back to Moir Awin going the back way through Harper Wood. Rowan accounts experiences he had as a child.
item.itunes:summary: Lia and Rowan head back to Moir Awin going the back way through Harper Wood. Rowan accounts experiences he had as a child.

item.title: Book I - Chapter XII - A Request
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia and Rowan return to Moir Awin. Siegfried proposes a question to Lia. Lia catches some fresh air and something horrible happens. This is the final chapter in Book 1. The story will continue in Book 2 releasing in 2008.
item.itunes:subtitle: Final Chapter in Book I. Continued in Book II.

item.title: Book II - Chapter XIII - The Keep
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia is introduced to the Gorlag Keep by way of a bit unusual bath. She is put to work in the kitchens where she meets the head cook.

item.title: Book II - Chapter XIV - Kitchen Secrets
item.itunes:subtitle: Lady From Day - Book 2
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia gets to work and meets the two kitchen staff Tayla, and Emteh. Emteh seems to be a tattle-tale and Tayla and her don't get along.
item.itunes:summary: Lia gets to work and meets the two kitchen staff Tayla, and Emteh. Emteh seems to be a tattle-tale and Tayla and her don't get along.

item.title: Book II - Chapter XV - Separation Anxiety
item.itunes:subtitle: Lady From Day - Book 2 - Chapter 15
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Rowan is getting anxious because Lia hasn't come back yet from after talking with Siegfried and walking around on her own to catch some air. Rowan decides to take matters into his own hands as he assumes she was captured by gorlags. He encounters a drunk Siegfried (pouting over his marriage proposal rejection) and talks to Aras and Renold.

item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Rowan and Siegfried discuss operations with a small trusted group Lia's men. When Rowan and Siegfried talk amongst themselves later on how they individually will infiltrate, they meet the Guardian of Harper Wood who offers to help them.

item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia and Emteh walk through the gorlag keep to find the servant quarters. Emteh talks about her experience at the keep with Lia and divulges a secret.

item.title: Book II - Chapter XIX - The Glorious Needle
item.itunes:subtitle: Lady From Day - Book 2 - Chapter 19
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Mira takes Siegfried and Rowan shopping for women's clothes and so they come up with a story to make it sound like the clothes aren't for them. The meet up with Gloria Naydle, Moir Awin's seamstress and she's a very large cockney lovable woman.

item.itunes:subtitle: Lady From Day - Book 2 - Chapter 20
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Tayla and Lia discuss the reliability of Emteh. Meanwhile Emteh is scheming for herself and reveals her motives to Lia.

item.title: Book II - Chapter XXI - Getting Into Character
item.itunes:subtitle: Lady From Day - Book 2 - Chapter 21 - End of Book 2
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Mira helps Siegfried and Rowan start acting like women rather then men as Mira helps them with their disguise. When Mira gets hit on by one of Rowan's men, she gets furious and talks to him. Then they go throughout the town to get more tools to make their disguises more accurate. Listen to the continuing story as Book 3 begins in June, 2008. Stay tuned for cast interviews in the meantime.

item.title: Book III - Chapter XXVI - Finding The Way
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia shows the ice cellar tunnel entrance to Rowan and Siegfried while Daylat (Tayla to the gorlags) makes a cake that the gorlags will never forget for their great feast to honor the capture of the two Chalosians (Rowan and Siegfried who are disguised as women).
item.itunes:summary: Lia shows the ice cellar tunnel entrance to Rowan and Siegfried while Daylat (Tayla to the gorlags) makes a cake that the gorlags will never forget for their great feast to honor the capture of the two Chalosians (Rowan and Siegfried who are disguised as women).
item.itunes:keywords: quest, adventure, town, servant, medieval, fantasy, novel, radioplay, drama, village, keep, castle, love

item.title: Book III - Chapter XXVII - Twilight
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: The gorlags have been taken under the work of the Datura Stramonium plant and are in a "twilight sleep". The plant affects their eyesight and their ability to think clearly. They are easy to persuade and at this time Daylat and Lia find the time to start their escape from the gorlag keep.
item.itunes:summary: The gorlags have been taken under the work of the Datura Stramonium plant and are in a "twilight sleep". The plant affects their eyesight and their ability to think clearly. They are easy to persuade and at this time Daylat and Lia find the time to start their escape from the gorlag keep.
item.itunes:keywords: quest, adventure, town, servant, medieval, fantasy, novel, radioplay, drama, village, keep, castle, love

item.title: Book III - Chapter XXVIII - Reunions
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: The four captives (Lia, Rowan, Siegfried, and Daylat) return to find the backup of Lia’s men and then are introduced to Mira (Randi Anderson). Daylat also finds the company of Gloria Naydle (Fiona Thraille) who was the seamstress of the tapestries at Feyris Castle.
item.itunes:summary: The four captives (Lia, Rowan, Siegfried, and Daylat) return to find the backup of Lia’s men and then are introduced to Mira (Randi Anderson). Daylat also finds the company of Gloria Naydle (Fiona Thraille) who was the seamstress of the tapestries at Feyris Castle.
item.itunes:keywords: quest, adventure, town, servant, medieval, fantasy, novel, radioplay, drama, village, keep, castle, love

item.title: Book III - Chapter XXIX - Finding The Ironsmith
item.itunes:author: April Sadowski
item.description: Lia (Sophie Neveu), Rowan (PhaeThorn), and Siegfried (JauntyHat) decide to go to Midonia in Fanarion to find Biron the blacksmith and Daylat (Mippa) wants to follow along to see her parents and enlist the help to free the servants at the gorlag keep.

item.itunes:keywords: quest, adventure, town, servant, medieval, fantasy, novel, radioplay, drama, village, keep, castle, love
